title: HOUR 3- Jason Jackson Sep 01, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Jason Jackson Sep 01, 2020
description:
Jason Jackson tells Dan that he really enjoyed the playoff checks back when Lebron was with the Heat. Jason said that the scouting of the Miami Heat is extraordinary and that is why the Heat are in the playoffs.
